DESCRIPTION: Scorched creatures take damage equal to their scorch and lose #b1 scorch when #yAttacked
When you obtain #b10 Sacrifice, increase the damage and Block of your [#94bdff]Holy[] cards by 1
When played, gain #ySacrifice equal to energy spent. Obtaining #b10 #ySacrifice increases damage and block gain of [#94bdff]Holy[] cards for the rest of combat.
When creature obtains #b8 Penance, it loses #b20 HP, and increases #yPenance damage by #b10 this combat.
#yAuraflame damages a random enemy and is reduced by #b1 after you play a card.
#yDeflecting #yScales damages a random enemy and is reduced by #b1 after you take damage.
[#fe513a]Primal[] Cards generate #yVigor equal to the energy spent when played.
#ySealed cards are improved whenever you discard a #yStatus or [#990702]Rune[] card.
#ySnekproof cards cannot have their costs modified by anything other then itself.
Discard a card and draw a new card to replace it.
[#990702]Rune[] cards create a Glyph activates the following effects when discarding a card up to X times.

[#548dff]Blessings[] create a #ySeal that breaks after taking X damage during your turn, activating its Blessing effect. NL If you took no damage during your turn you will lose #b2 HP at the end of your turn.
#ySpirit #yWound kills it's target if Spirit Wound equals or exceeds it's health.
#yStatic reduces damage dealt, reduced after attacking. NL #yStuns and is reduced to 0 if #yStatic is greater then #b20
#yChi is generated and spent by Windwalker cards, you may not have more than #b5 #yChi at once. NL Excess Chi becomes Temporary #yStrength and #yFocus
Increase the damage and Block of ALL copies of the next x cards you play by #b2 for the combat
#yMartial cards count as Strikes and Defends.
#yOrb: Deals [WindIcon] Damage to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: Deals [DrainIcon] Damage to random enemies.
#yOrb: Deals [ElectricIcon] Damage to random enemies and increases effectiveness.
#yOrb: Grants #yBlock and increases the number of cards effected when evoked, when Evoked reduces the cost of random cards in hand by 1.
#yChannel 1 of the 3 #yWords of this Shout. When all 3 Words are channeled, an additional effect is gained and all 3 Words are #yEvoked.
#yShout : Grants [IceIcon] Block and deals [IceIcon] damage NL #yPassive : If you have #b2 or more Orbs from this set deal [IceIcon] damage damage to a random enemy NL #yOrbs : #yFo #yKrah #yDiin
#yOrb: #yEvoke - Gain [IceIcon] Block
#yOrb: #yEvoke - Deal [IceIcon] damage to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: #yEvoke - Apply #yWeak to ALL enemies.
#yChakra's are buffs with no duration which impart the associated Damage Type on to your Normal damage #yStrikes and #yDefends NL You may not have more then #b1 #yChakra at a time
Spend up to X #yChi and activate the following effect.
#ySpirit #yDamage Ignores #yBlock, and Creatures dealt #ySpirit #yDamage gain #ySpirit #yWound instead of losing HP.
#yBlock : Does not Decay at start of turn NL When broken : applies #ySpirit #yWound to you and the attacker
#yLightning #yDamage applies #yStatic equal to half of unblocked damage dealt.
#yBlock : Applies #yStatic to the attacker when broken
#yFire damage deals half as much damage to targets without #yBlock, but apply #yScorch equal to the damage dealt instead.
#yBlock : When damaged applies #yScorch to the Attacker.
#yDivine damage applies #yPenance equal to half the Unblocked damage it deals.
#yBlock : Used before other block types. not lost at the start of your turn.
#yFrost damage grants [IceIcon] Block equal to the damage it deals.
#yBlock : Does not Decay at the start of your turn but applies weak to you at the start of your turn if you have any.
#yArcane damage is increased by #yFocus and #yLock-On.
#yBlock : Increased by #yFocus and when lost becomes #yTemporary #yFocus.
